tasks.label: Run UI Smoke
args:
set -e
# Kill any existing server
pkill -f 'node server.js' || true
# Start server in background
node server.js &
# Wait for server
node -e "const http=require('http');const BASE='http://localhost:3001';(async()=>{const s=Date.now();while(Date.now()-s<15000){try{await new Promise((r,j)=>{const req=http.get(BASE+'/api/health',res=>{res.statusCode===200?r():j(new Error('HTTP '+res.statusCode))});req.on('error',j)});process.exit(0)}catch(e){await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,500))}}process.exit(1)})()"
# Run the UI chat smoke test
node test/ui-chat-smoke.js
